评论详情: My grand daughter loves this short. She says it’s soft and very comfortable. Fits true to size.
This shirt is one of the best in quality that I've EVERRRRR purchased (I KID YOU NOT)!!! The feel and the fit was perfect!  XL = 5'11 - 175lb

I would say that I ordered a different color but I received the black one which I think is the default; so I would just say to be mindful of that. Because of the thickness of the material and the black color, I would not recommend wearing out during the summer. However, it is a cute oversized shirt that is easy to style with many outfits! The fabric is also not that scratchy and the design is simple enough to dress up and down with other accessories. Overall, this shirt is a 4/5 for its design!
I really love it and the quality is amazing

I don't know where to start with this one. First of all, this shirt is very high quality in my opinion. The packaging, for one was very thoughtful and even the label has a nice quality to it. It also came with this unique fragrance packet which I really liked the smell of and appreciated, as most shirts I order from Amazon end up smelling like chemicals.  In terms of the graphic design, the print seems to be screen printed with good-quality ink. I don't expect this to be cracking anytime soon! The pink color is very true to the image. It's a soft, but vibrant pink hue. It is oversized so don't expect it to be tight or short. It's long enough on me that it covers my bum. The fabric is THICK. Don't expect a thin shirt. I was sweating in the Texas heat pretty quickly after putting this on and going outside. This shirt will keep you pretty warm, but would be nice for a cool spring or fall day. Overall, the attention to the small details is what sold me on this shirt.

I love the way that this T-shirt is cut and crafted a Scott kind of a bulbus design, which makes it look oversized without being sloppy. The color and print are incredible. I love this T-shirt. I wear it all the time!

I recently tried the BestLucky Star Shirt Y2k Oversized Graphic Tee, and it exceeded my expectations in several ways. The vintage streetwear design is eye-catching and nostalgic, perfect for anyone looking to embrace the Y2k fashion trend. The oversized fit is comfortable and provides a relaxed, laid-back vibe that works well for both casual outings and lounging at home.  The fabric is soft and breathable, making it ideal for all-day wear. The quality of the graphic print is impressive, showing no signs of fading or cracking after multiple washes. This tee is versatile and can be styled in various ways, whether paired with jeans, shorts, or layered under a jacket.  Overall, the BestLucky Star Shirt is a great addition to any wardrobe, offering both style and comfort. Highly recommended for fans of vintage and streetwear fashion!

I wear the Best Lucky Star shirt often. It looks great no matter what it is paired with and it always feels good, comfortably oversized and easy to move around in. So far, the shirt has washed and dried without any shrinkage. There is an added bonus. I don’t know if this is intentional - the shirt has a slight scent of incense that is imbedded in the star’s paint. It is a lovely scent that appears when I move. I hope it sticks around. I highly recommend this wonderful shirt.

评论概述: Good quality fabric a bit pricey
评论详情: 4.5  (standard rounding rules apply) sizing is accurate design is clear and accurate to pictures held up in the wash but priced slightly high for what it is would recommend

评论概述: love it!  might want to order up a size to get that oversize look FYI
评论详情: Reviewed by spouse:  This definitely gives off Y2K vibes, but also maybe a little bit of magnolia pearl and or jaded gypsy vibes. It’s an oversize fit, but not lot, so if you want an oversize/slouchy fit definitely go up a size. I am wearing the large and for sizing reference, I’m 5’3, 135 and 34c and this is the look that I wanted to wear over a long fitted skirt.

I like the star design, the color is great too! The fit is oversized as described and this is a regular cotton t-shirt material. Added bonus, my kid is going to wear it to Conan Grey concert so win-win ! 😂  I do really like the shirt - great with jeans and shorts alike!
